pages.text: $(italic)You already thought that the moment you put the recipe on paper that this creation wil be something special.$(br2)The combination of the power of The End, redstone and magic gives it very strange properties.

Depending on the strength of the applied redstone signal, this block takes on different properties.$(br2)Without redstone, it is completely solid; when a redstone signal reaches it, it becomes transparent, almost like glass.$(br)However, it reaches its most curious state when a redstone signal of full strength is applied...
$(br2)To make it even stranger, the material seems to respond to the last applied signal alone, not the strongest.$(br2)Truly a curiosity from the end.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.test: With the smallest external influence in the form of blocks it falls back to the state of lowest energy.
